short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all the distractions from youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is designed to help users eliminate all the distractions that can keep them from being productive while using YouTube. The extension works by removing all the clutter and elements that can be distracting, such as recommended videos, Shorts, and Subscriptions.

When you install the extension, it will automatically remove all the distracting elements from the YouTube page, leaving only the search bar. This will allow you to search what to focus on without any unnecessary distractions.

The extension ito activate automatically every time you visit a YouTube page.

Overall, this extension is perfect for anyone who wants to make the most out of their time on YouTube and avoid getting sidetracked by all the tempting distractions that can be found on the platform.
